verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus what a Saviour, what a Brother, what a friend
lifter of the lowly, God you meet me where I am

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your Love it has no borders, has no walls
Your contantly moving towards me with open arms

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I've never known a love like yours x4

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, Hallelujah
what a beautiful way You show this

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, Hallelujah
what a wonderful Saviour
